title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the U.S. current account will be in deficit and/or does not explain that an increase in the U.S. real GDP increases the U.S.’s demand for European goods and services, which increases imports.

The response states that the U.S. current account will be in deficit and for explaining that an increase in the U.S. real GDP increases the U.S.’s demand for European goods and services, which increases imports.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response only includes the first criterion below.
The response includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include any of the following.

· State that the demand for the dollar will decrease and explain that capital flows from the European Union to the U.S. will decrease.

· State that the dollar will depreciate.
The response does not include one of the following.
The response includes both of the following.
